00040 require_once('include.php');
00041 
00042 $GoingDown= FALSE;
00043 if ($_POST) {
00044     if ($_POST['Restart']) {
00045         PrintHelpWindow(_NOTICE('System is restarting...'), 'auto', 'WARN');
00046         $View->Controller($Output, 'Restart');
00047     }
00048     else if ($_POST['Stop']) {
00049         PrintHelpWindow(_NOTICE('System is going down...'), 'auto', 'WARN');
00050         $View->Controller($Output, 'Shutdown');
00051     }
00052     $GoingDown= TRUE;
00053 }
00054 
00055 $Reload= TRUE;
00056 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'header.php');
00057 
00058 if (!$GoingDown) {
00060     if (in_array($_SESSION['USER'], $ADMIN)) {
00061         $RestartConfirm= _NOTICE('Are you sure you want to restart the <NAME>?');
00062         $RestartConfirm= preg_replace('/<NAME>/', _($Modules[$View->Model]['Name']), $RestartConfirm);
00063         $StopConfirm= _NOTICE('Are you sure you want to stop the <NAME>?');
00064         $StopConfirm= preg_replace('/<NAME>/', _($Modules[$View->Model]['Name']), $StopConfirm);
00065         ?>
00066         <table>
00067             <tr>
00068                 <td>
00069                     <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00070                         <strong><?php echo _TITLE('System').' ' ?></strong>
00071                         <input type="submit" name="Restart" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Restart') ?>" onclick="return confirm('<?php echo $RestartConfirm ?>')"/>
00072                         <input type="submit" name="Stop" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Stop') ?>" onclick="return confirm('<?php echo $StopConfirm ?>')"/>
00073                     </form>
00074                 </td>
00075                 <td style="width: 50%;">
00076                     <?php
00077                     PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX('You can restart or stop the system using these buttons.'), 400);
00078                     ?>
00079                 </td>
00080             </tr>
00081         </table>
00082         <?php
00083     }
00084     $View->Controller($Output, 'GetProcList');
00085     $View->PrintProcessTable(unserialize($Output[0]), TRUE);
00086 }

00088 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'footer.php');
